column4: Does anyone use a laptop and have their battery meter or cpu-throttling working?
it works here
no
it me again, i had to format my HD with linux on and i cant remeber how 2 mount my HDs, can tell me how do it again please?
windows drives?
yeah
thanks, your a star
how do i give myself permision to write to the HDs?
writing to ntfs isn't supported
oh, how do i mount my DVD drives then?
you should just be able to put a dvd in the drive
ok, just one more question, i still cant get mp3s to play? how do i make them play?

try a different mp3
did you install that file that gnomefreak linked you to earlier?
yeah - i just get errors
did you follow the instructions about enabling universe?
yeah it will play them now, but i have no sound
do you have sound with anything?
not on linux
maybe someone else can help you with that
